statements: SELECT * FROM inventory;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM inventory;
SELECT product_name, price FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 0;
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE price < 100;
SELECT product_id, product_name FROM inventory WHERE quantity >= 10;
SELECT product_id, product_name, price FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 0 AND price < 50;
SELECT DISTINCT product_name FROM inventory;
SELECT product_name FROM inventory WHERE price BETWEEN 50 AND 100;
SELECT product_name FROM inventory WHERE product_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT product_id, quantity, price FROM inventory WHERE product_name = 'Phone';
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM inventory;
SELECT SUM(quantity) FROM inventory;
SELECT AVG(price) FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 0;
SELECT MAX(price) FROM inventory;
SELECT MIN(price) FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 0;
SELECT product_name, price, quantity, price * quantity AS total_value FROM inventory;
SELECT product_name, quantity, price, quantity * price AS total_price FROM inventory WHERE price < 50;
SELECT product_name, quantity, price, price * quantity AS total_price FROM inventory ORDER BY total_price DESC;
SELECT product_name, quantity, price FROM inventory ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM inventory WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM inventory LIMIT 10 OFFSET 5;
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 100 AND price < 50.00;
SELECT product_id, product_name FROM inventory WHERE price BETWEEN 20.00 AND 50.00;
SELECT product_name, price FROM inventory WHERE quantity <= 50 OR price > 100.00;
SELECT SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM inventory;
SELECT AVG(price) AS average_price FROM inventory;
SELECT product_id, product_name, quantity, price FROM inventory WHERE product_id = 5;
SELECT product_name, price * quantity AS total_price FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 0;
SELECT COUNT(product_id) AS total_products FROM inventory;
SELECT product_id, product_name, quantity FROM inventory ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT product_name, SUM(quantity * price) AS total_value FROM inventory GROUP BY product_name;
SELECT product_id, product_name, quantity, price FROM inventory WHERE product_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT DISTINCT product_name FROM inventory;
SELECT product_id, product_name, quantity, price FROM inventory WHERE price = (SELECT MAX(price) FROM inventory);
SELECT DISTINCT product_name, price FROM inventory ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT product_id, product_name, price FROM inventory WHERE quantity > (SELECT AVG(quantity) FROM inventory);
SELECT product_id, product_name, price, price * quantity AS total_price FROM inventory WHERE price * quantity > 100;
SELECT product_id, product_name, quantity, price, price * quantity AS total_value FROM inventory WHERE quantity >= 10;
SELECT product_name, price, price * quantity AS total_value FROM inventory WHERE quantity <= 20;
SELECT product_id, product_name, quantity, price FROM inventory LIMIT 5 OFFSET 10;
SELECT product_name, quantity, price FROM inventory WHERE quantity < 50 AND price > 30.00;
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT product_name, product_price FROM products;
SELECT product_name, product_quantity FROM products WHERE product_price > 100;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE product_id = 5;
SELECT SUM(product_price) AS total_price FROM products;
SELECT product_name, product_quantity * product_price AS total_value FROM products;
SELECT product_name, product_price FROM products ORDER BY product_price DESC;
SELECT product_name, product_price FROM products ORDER BY product_quantity ASC;
SELECT * FROM inventory_updates;
SELECT product_name, update_quantity, update_time FROM products JOIN inventory_updates ON products.product_id = inventory_updates.product_id;
SELECT product_name, update_quantity, update_time FROM products LEFT JOIN inventory_updates ON products.product_id = inventory_updates.product_id;
SELECT product_name, update_quantity, update_time FROM products RIGHT JOIN inventory_updates ON products.product_id = inventory_updates.product_id;
SELECT product_name, update_quantity, update_time FROM products INNER JOIN inventory_updates ON products.product_id = inventory_updates.product_id;
SELECT product_name, update_quantity, update_time FROM products LEFT JOIN inventory_updates ON products.product_id = inventory_updates.product_id WHERE update_quantity > 0;
SELECT product_name, update_quantity, update_time FROM products RIGHT JOIN inventory_updates ON products.product_id = inventory_updates.product_id WHERE product_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT product_name, update_quantity, update_time FROM products INNER JOIN inventory_updates ON products.product_id = inventory_updates.product_id WHERE product_price < 50;
SELECT product_name, update_quantity, update_time FROM products JOIN inventory_updates ON products.product_id = inventory_updates.product_id ORDER BY update_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE product_quantity < (SELECT AVG(product_quantity) FROM products);
SELECT product_name, COUNT(*) AS update_count FROM products JOIN inventory_updates ON products.product_id = inventory_updates.product_id GROUP BY product_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 5;

SELECT product_name, MAX(update_quantity) AS max_update_quantity FROM products JOIN inventory_updates ON products.product_id = inventory_updates.product_id GROUP BY product_name ORDER BY max_update_quantity DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE product_price > 100
SELECT product_name, product_quantity FROM products WHERE product_price < 50
SELECT product_name, product_price, update_time FROM products JOIN inventory_updates ON products.product_id = inventory_updates.product_id
SELECT products.product_name, inventory_updates.update_quantity FROM products, inventory_updates WHERE products.product_id = inventory_updates.product_id
SELECT AVG(product_price) FROM products
SELECT SUM(product_quantity) FROM products
SELECT product_name, SUM(update_quantity) FROM products JOIN inventory_updates ON products.product_id = inventory_updates.product_id GROUP BY product_name
SELECT * FROM products ORDER BY product_price DESC
SELECT product_name, product_price FROM products WHERE product_name LIKE '%chair%'
SELECT * FROM products WHERE product_quantity <= 10 AND product_price > 50
SELECT product_name, COUNT(*) AS total_updates FROM products JOIN inventory_updates ON products.product_id = inventory_updates.product_id GROUP BY product_name HAVING total_updates > 2
SELECT product_name, MAX(product_quantity) FROM products GROUP BY product_name
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT product_id) FROM products
SELECT product_name, product_price FROM products WHERE product_price BETWEEN 50 AND 100
SELECT product_name, SUM(update_quantity) FROM products JOIN inventory_updates ON products.product_id = inventory_updates.product_id WHERE update_time BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31'
SELECT product_id, product_name, product_quantity FROM products UNION SELECT product_id, 'OUT OF STOCK' AS product_name, 0 AS product_quantity FROM products WHERE product_quantity = 0
SELECT product_name, AVG(update_quantity) AS avg_quantity FROM products JOIN inventory_updates ON products.product_id = inventory_updates.product_id GROUP BY product_name HAVING avg_quantity > 5
SELECT product_name, product_quantity FROM products WHERE product_quantity IN (SELECT MIN(product_quantity) FROM products)
SELECT * FROM Product;
SELECT name, price FROM Product;
SELECT product_id, name, price, quantity FROM Product;
SELECT * FROM Inventory;
SELECT stock, last_updated FROM Inventory;
SELECT inventory_id, product_id, stock, last_updated FROM Inventory;
SELECT * FROM 'Order';
SELECT product_id, quantity, order_date FROM 'Order';
SELECT order_id, product_id, quantity, order_date, status FROM 'Order';
SELECT p.name, p.price, i.stock FROM Product p INNER JOIN Inventory i ON p.product_id = i.product_id;
SELECT p.name, o.quantity, o.order_date FROM Product p INNER JOIN 'Order' o ON p.product_id = o.product_id;
SELECT p.name, i.stock, o.quantity, o.order_date FROM Product p INNER JOIN Inventory i ON p.product_id = i.product_id INNER JOIN 'Order' o ON p.product_id = o.product_id;
SELECT p.name, p.price, SUM(i.stock) AS total_stock FROM Product p INNER JOIN Inventory i ON p.product_id = i.product_id GROUP BY p.product_id;
SELECT p.name, COUNT(o.order_id) AS total_orders FROM Product p LEFT JOIN 'Order' o ON p.product_id = o.product_id GROUP BY p.product_id;
SELECT p.name, i.stock, o.quantity, o.order_date FROM Product p INNER JOIN Inventory i ON p.product_id = i.product_id LEFT JOIN 'Order' o ON p.product_id = o.product_id;
SELECT p.name, p.price, o.quantity, o.order_date, o.status FROM Product p INNER JOIN 'Order' o ON p.product_id = o.product_id WHERE o.status = 'Shipped';
SELECT * FROM Product WHERE price > 100;
SELECT * FROM Inventory WHERE stock < 10;
SELECT * FROM 'Order' WHERE status = 'Pending';
SELECT * FROM Product WHERE name LIKE '%phone%';
SELECT * FROM Inventory WHERE last_updated < '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Product;
SELECT name, price FROM Product WHERE price > 100;
SELECT p.name, i.stock FROM Product p JOIN Inventory i ON p.product_id = i.product_id;
SELECT o.order_id, p.name, o.quantity, o.order_date FROM Order o JOIN Product p ON o.product_id = p.product_id;
SELECT p.name, p.price, i.stock, o.quantity FROM Product p JOIN Inventory i ON p.product_id = i.product_id JOIN Order o ON o.product_id = p.product_id;
SELECT p.name AS product_name, i.stock AS available_stock FROM Product p JOIN Inventory i ON p.product_id = i.product_id WHERE i.stock > 0;
SELECT p.name, SUM(o.quantity) AS total_quantity FROM Product p JOIN Order o ON p.product_id = o.product_id GROUP BY p.name;
SELECT p.name, AVG(o.quantity) AS avg_quantity FROM Product p JOIN Order o ON p.product_id = o.product_id GROUP BY p.name;
SELECT p.name, MAX(i.stock) AS max_stock FROM Product p JOIN Inventory i ON p.product_id = i.product_id GROUP BY p.name;
SELECT p.name, DATE_FORMAT(o.order_date, '%Y-%m-%d') AS formatted_date FROM Product p JOIN Order o ON p.product_id = o.product_id;
SELECT p.name, COUNT(o.order_id) AS total_orders FROM Product p JOIN Order o ON p.product_id = o.product_id GROUP BY p.name;
SELECT p.name, MAX(o.quantity) AS max_quantity FROM Product p JOIN Order o ON p.product_id = o.product_id GROUP BY p.name;
SELECT p.name, MIN(i.stock) AS min_stock FROM Product p JOIN Inventory i ON p.product_id = i.product_id GROUP BY p.name;
SELECT p.name, AVG(p.price) AS avg_price FROM Product p;

SELECT p.name, i.stock, o.quantity, COUNT(*) AS total_orders FROM Product p JOIN Inventory i ON p.product_id = i.product_id JOIN Order o ON o.product_id = p.product_id GROUP BY p.name, i.stock, o.quantity HAVING total_orders > 5;
SELECT p.name, i.stock FROM Product p JOIN Inventory i ON p.product_id = i.product_id WHERE i.stock < (SELECT AVG(stock) FROM Inventory);
SELECT p.name, p.price, o.quantity FROM Product p LEFT JOIN Order o ON p.product_id = o.product_id;
SELECT p.name, i.stock, o.quantity FROM Product p LEFT JOIN Inventory i ON p.product_id = i.product_id LEFT JOIN Order o ON o.product_id = p.product_id;
SELECT p.name, o.quantity, DATE_FORMAT(o.order_date, '%Y-%m-%d') AS formatted_date FROM Product p JOIN Order o ON p.product_id = o.product_id WHERE DATE(o.order_date) = CURDATE();
SELECT p.name, SUM(i.stock) AS total_stock FROM Product p JOIN Inventory i ON p.product_id = i.product_id GROUP BY p.name;
SELECT * FROM inventory;
SELECT id, product_name FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 0;
SELECT id, product_name, quantity, price FROM inventory WHERE price < 50;
SELECT * FROM orders;
SELECT order_id, product_id, quantity FROM orders WHERE quantity > 5;
SELECT order_id, product_id, order_date FROM orders WHERE quantity < 10;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '555%';
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, phone_number FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM sales;
SELECT sale_id, order_id, product_id FROM sales WHERE order_id IS NOT NULL;
SELECT sale_id, order_id, sale_date FROM sales WHERE sale_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM inventory JOIN orders ON inventory.id = orders.product_id;
SELECT * FROM inventory LEFT JOIN orders ON inventory.id = orders.product_id;
SELECT * FROM customers JOIN sales ON customers.customer_id = sales.order_id;
SELECT * FROM customers LEFT JOIN sales ON customers.customer_id = sales.order_id;
SELECT id, product_name, quantity, price FROM inventory ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT order_id, product_id, quantity FROM orders ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT sale_id, order_id, product_id FROM sales ORDER BY order_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE product_name LIKE '%apple%';
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT product_name, price FROM inventory WHERE price > 50;
SELECT * FROM orders JOIN inventory ON orders.product_id = inventory.id WHERE quantity > 5;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM inventory WHERE quantity BETWEEN 5 AND 10;
SELECT orders.order_id, inventory.product_name, orders.quantity FROM orders JOIN inventory ON orders.product_id = inventory.id;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, phone_number FROM customers WHERE LENGTH(phone_number) > 10;
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE order_date >= '2022-01-01' AND order_date <= '2022-06-30';
SELECT product_name, price * quantity AS total_price FROM inventory;
SELECT DISTINCT sales.order_id, sales.sale_date FROM sales JOIN orders ON sales.order_id = orders.order_id;
SELECT customer_name FROM customers WHERE customer_id IN (SELECT customer_id FROM sales);
SELECT COUNT(*) AS order_count FROM orders WHERE order_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = (SELECT customer_id FROM sales WHERE order_id = 1);
SELECT product_name, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM inventory GROUP BY product_name;
SELECT AVG(price) AS average_price FROM inventory;
SELECT customer_name, COUNT(*) AS total_orders FROM customers JOIN sales ON customers.customer_id = sales.customer_id GROUP BY customer_name;
SELECT customer_name, MAX(sale_date) AS last_sale_date FROM customers JOIN sales ON customers.customer_id = sales.customer_id GROUP BY customer_name;
SELECT DISTINCT customer_name FROM customers JOIN sales ON customers.customer_id = sales.customer_id;
SELECT customer_name, AVG(price) AS avg_price FROM customers JOIN sales ON customers.customer_id = sales.customer_id GROUP BY customer_name;
SELECT product_name, quantity, price FROM inventory WHERE price = (SELECT MAX(price) FROM inventory);
SELECT * FROM Inventory;
SELECT * FROM Orders;
SELECT * FROM Customers;
SELECT * FROM Products;
SELECT * FROM Transactions;
SELECT product_id, quantity FROM Inventory;
SELECT order_id, product_id, quantity, status FROM Orders;
SELECT customer_id, name, email FROM Customers;
SELECT product_id, name, price FROM Products;
SELECT transaction_id, order_id, amount FROM Transactions;
SELECT name, price FROM Products WHERE price > 50;
SELECT * FROM Orders WHERE status='pending';
SELECT customer_id, name FROM Customers WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT order_id, product_id, quantity FROM Orders WHERE status='completed';
SELECT * FROM Transactions WHERE amount >= 100;
SELECT * FROM Inventory ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT name, price FROM Products ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT * FROM Orders WHERE order_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT customer_id, name FROM Customers WHERE customer_id BETWEEN 100 AND 200;
SELECT * FROM Transactions WHERE order_id IS NOT NULL;
SELECT name, price FROM Products LIMIT 5 OFFSET 10;
SELECT * FROM Inventory;
SELECT product_id, quantity FROM Inventory WHERE quantity > 0;
SELECT Orders.order_id, Orders.quantity, Products.name FROM Orders JOIN Products ON Orders.product_id = Products.product_id;
SELECT Customers.name, Orders.product_id, Products.price FROM Customers JOIN Orders ON Customers.customer_id = Orders.customer_id JOIN Products ON Orders.product_id = Products.product_id;
SELECT Orders.order_id, Orders.quantity, Products.name FROM Orders JOIN Products ON Orders.product_id = Products.product_id WHERE Orders.status = 'shipped';
SELECT Customers.name, Customers.email, Transactions.amount FROM Customers JOIN Orders ON Customers.customer_id = Orders.customer_id JOIN Transactions ON Orders.order_id = Transactions.order_id;

SELECT Customers.name, SUM(Transactions.amount) AS total_spent FROM Customers JOIN Orders ON Customers.customer_id = Orders.customer_id JOIN Transactions ON Orders.order_id = Transactions.order_id GROUP BY Customers.customer_id;
SELECT Customers.name, Orders.status, COUNT(Orders.order_id) AS total_orders FROM Customers JOIN Orders ON Customers.customer_id = Orders.customer_id GROUP BY Customers.customer_id, Orders.status;

SELECT Customers.name AS customer_name, Orders.order_id AS order_number, Products.name AS product_name, Products.price AS product_price FROM Customers JOIN Orders ON Customers.customer_id = Orders.customer_id JOIN Products ON Orders.product_id = Products.product_id;

SELECT Customers.name AS customer_name, Orders.order_id AS order_number, SUM(Products.price * Orders.quantity) AS total_order_amount FROM Customers JOIN Orders ON Customers.customer_id = Orders.customer_id JOIN Products ON Orders.product_id = Products.product_id GROUP BY Customers.customer_id, Orders.order_id;

SELECT Products.name AS product_name, COUNT(Orders.order_id) AS total_orders, SUM(Orders.quantity) AS total_quantity_sold FROM Products JOIN Orders ON Products.product_id = Orders.product_id GROUP BY Products.product_id, Products.name;

SELECT Customers.name AS customer_name, Orders.order_id AS order_number, Products.name AS product_name, Orders.quantity AS order_quantity, Transactions.amount AS transaction_amount FROM Customers JOIN Orders ON Customers.customer_id = Orders.customer_id JOIN Products ON Orders.product_id = Products.product_id JOIN Transactions ON Orders.order_id = Transactions.order_id;

SELECT Customers.name AS customer_name, COUNT(DISTINCT Orders.order_id) AS total_orders, SUM(Orders.quantity) AS total_quantity_ordered, SUM(Transactions.amount) AS total_spent FROM Customers JOIN Orders ON Customers.customer_id = Orders.customer_id JOIN Transactions ON Orders.order_id = Transactions.order_id GROUP BY Customers.customer_id;

SELECT Products.name AS product_name, SUM(Orders.quantity) AS total_quantity_ordered, SUM(Transactions.amount) AS total_revenue FROM Products JOIN Orders ON Products.product_id = Orders.product_id JOIN Transactions ON Orders.order_id = Transactions.order_id GROUP BY Products.product_id;

SELECT Customers.name AS customer_name, Orders.order_id AS order_number, SUM(Products.price * Orders.quantity) AS total_order_amount, SUM(Transactions.amount) AS total_paid_amount, SUM(Products.price * Orders.quantity) - SUM(Transactions.amount) AS balance FROM Customers JOIN Orders ON Customers.customer_id = Orders.customer_id JOIN Products ON Orders.product_id = Products.product_id JOIN Transactions ON Orders.order_id = Transactions.order_id GROUP BY Customers.customer_id;

SELECT Customers.name, COUNT(Orders.order_id) AS total_orders, SUM(Orders.quantity * Products.price) AS total_order_amount, SUM(Transactions.amount) AS total_paid_amount, SUM(Orders.quantity * Products.price) - SUM(Transactions.amount) AS balance FROM Customers JOIN Orders ON Customers.customer_id = Orders.customer_id JOIN Products ON Orders.product_id = Products.product_id JOIN Transactions ON Orders.order_id = Transactions.order_id GROUP BY Customers.customer_id;

SELECT Products.name AS product_name, SUM(Orders.quantity) AS total_quantity_ordered, SUM(Orders.quantity * Products.price) AS total_revenue, SUM(Transactions.amount) AS total_paid_amount, SUM(Orders.quantity * Products.price) - SUM(Transactions.amount) AS profit FROM Products JOIN Orders ON Products.product_id = Orders.product_id JOIN Transactions ON Orders.order_id = Transactions.order_id GROUP BY Products.product_id;

SELECT Customers.name AS customer_name, Orders.order_id AS order_number, Orders.status, Products.name AS product_name, Products.price AS product_price, Transactions.amount AS payment_amount FROM Customers JOIN Orders ON Customers.customer_id = Orders.customer_id JOIN Products ON Orders.product_id = Products.product_id JOIN Transactions ON Orders.order_id = Transactions.order_id;

SELECT Products.name AS product_name, SUM(Orders.quantity) AS total_quantity_ordered, AVG(Products.price) AS average_price FROM Products JOIN Orders ON Products.product_id = Orders.product_id GROUP BY Products.product_id, Products.name;

SELECT Customers.name AS customer_name, COUNT(Orders.order_id) AS total_orders, AVG(Orders.quantity) AS average_order_quantity FROM Customers JOIN Orders ON Customers.customer_id = Orders.customer_id GROUP BY Customers.customer_id;
